title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.10 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.10 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations

Denial of a request for records or amendment of correction
of a record or personal information shall: (a) state the specific facts and reasons for
the denial; and
(b) advise the
requestor of the right to appeal such denial to the State Commission of

Correction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7202.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
